title: Repotar Health
subTitle: Repotar Health
body: A crowd sourcing health facility app for checking registered and unregistered health facilities and reporting unregistered health facilities for enhanced quality health service delivery in Nigeria.
appFunctions: Reporta Health permits searching for health facilities and services available within them
Mobile application for Android & iOS (Angular, Ionic, Cordova)

title: Gidi Agents
